<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><Highlight kind="normal">      Row.Line += <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa20539e89704d20b98b97e9c3feac934">Data</a>.getSLEB128(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">default</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">: &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// A byte that contains both address and line increment.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><Highlight kind="normal">        uint8&#95;t AdjustedOp = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a> - <a href="#a90de7cef943238ae1b541e31b373ed68a8c2683a4c8021dd82216826ec37144c5">FirstSpecial</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><Highlight kind="normal">        int64&#95;t LineDelta = MinDelta + (AdjustedOp % LineRange);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><Highlight kind="normal">        uint64&#95;t AddrDelta = (AdjustedOp / LineRange);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><Highlight kind="normal">        Row.Line += LineDelta;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="normal">        Row.Addr += AddrDelta;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the function callback returns false, we stop parsing.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Callback(Row) == </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gsym/linetable/#a41c4a2acdbcfaf2a18a61b60d42a9dc4"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">llvm::Error</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gsym/linetable/#a41c4a2acdbcfaf2a18a61b60d42a9dc4">LineTable::encode</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gsym/filewriter">FileWriter</a> &amp;Out, uint64&#95;t BaseAddr)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Users must verify the LineTable is valid prior to calling this funtion.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We don&#39;t want to emit any LineTable objects if they are not valid since</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gsym/linetable/#abada6578389b8ebe5ade2c69fbc67b02">isValid</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><Highlight kind="normal">  int64&#95;t MinLineDelta = <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/datatypes-h/#ad0d744f05898e32d01f73f8af3cd2071">INT64&#95;MAX</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><Highlight kind="normal">  int64&#95;t MaxLineDelta = <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/datatypes-h/#ab21f12f372f67b8ff0aa3432336ede67">INT64&#95;MIN</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::vector&lt;DeltaInfo&gt; DeltaInfos;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Lines.size() == 1) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><Highlight kind="normal">    MinLineDelta = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><Highlight kind="normal">    int64&#95;t PrevLine = 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa7fb55ed0b7a30342ba6da306428cae04">First</a> = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;line&#95;entry : Lines) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa7fb55ed0b7a30342ba6da306428cae04">First</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa7fb55ed0b7a30342ba6da306428cae04">First</a> = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><Highlight kind="normal">        int64&#95;t LineDelta = (int64&#95;t)line&#95;entry.Line - PrevLine;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> End = DeltaInfos.end();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Pos = std::lower&#95;bound(DeltaInfos.begin(), End, LineDelta);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Pos != End &amp;&amp; Pos-&gt;Delta == LineDelta)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><Highlight kind="normal">          ++Pos-&gt;Count;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><Highlight kind="normal">          DeltaInfos.insert(Pos, <a href="/docs/api/structs/deltainfo">DeltaInfo</a>(LineDelta, 1));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (LineDelta &lt; MinLineDelta)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><Highlight kind="normal">          MinLineDelta = LineDelta;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (LineDelta &gt; MaxLineDelta)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><Highlight kind="normal">          MaxLineDelta = LineDelta;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><Highlight kind="normal">      PrevLine = (int64&#95;t)line&#95;entry.Line;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(MinLineDelta &lt;= MaxLineDelta);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Set the min and max line delta intelligently based on the counts of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the line deltas. if our range is too large.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> int64&#95;t MaxLineRange = 14;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (MaxLineDelta - MinLineDelta &gt; MaxLineRange) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint32&#95;t BestIndex = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint32&#95;t BestEndIndex = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint32&#95;t BestCount = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumDeltaInfos = DeltaInfos.size();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (uint32&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = 0; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &lt; NumDeltaInfos; ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> int64&#95;t FirstDelta = DeltaInfos&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93;.Delta;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><Highlight kind="normal">      uint32&#95;t CurrCount = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><Highlight kind="normal">      uint32&#95;t J;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (J = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>; J &lt; NumDeltaInfos; ++J) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LineRange = DeltaInfos&#91;J&#93;.Delta - FirstDelta;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (LineRange &gt; MaxLineRange)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><Highlight kind="normal">        CurrCount += DeltaInfos&#91;J&#93;.Count;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (CurrCount &gt; BestCount) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><Highlight kind="normal">        BestIndex = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><Highlight kind="normal">        BestEndIndex = J - 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><Highlight kind="normal">        BestCount = CurrCount;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><Highlight kind="normal">    MinLineDelta = DeltaInfos&#91;BestIndex&#93;.Delta;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><Highlight kind="normal">    MaxLineDelta = DeltaInfos&#91;BestEndIndex&#93;.Delta;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (MinLineDelta == MaxLineDelta &amp;&amp; MinLineDelta &gt; 0 &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><Highlight kind="normal">      MinLineDelta &lt; MaxLineRange)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><Highlight kind="normal">    MinLineDelta = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(MinLineDelta &lt;= MaxLineDelta);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Initialize the line entry state as a starting point. All line entries</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// will be deltas from this.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/gsym/lineentry">LineEntry</a> Prev(BaseAddr, 1, Lines.front().Line);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Write out the min and max line delta as signed LEB128.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><Highlight kind="normal">  Out.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gsym/filewriter/#a3d4ccfc2f70d9b024d7489a9e943389e">writeSLEB</a>(MinLineDelta);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><Highlight kind="normal">  Out.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gsym/filewriter/#a3d4ccfc2f70d9b024d7489a9e943389e">writeSLEB</a>(MaxLineDelta);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Write out the starting line number as a unsigned LEB128.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><Highlight kind="normal">  Out.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gsym/filewriter/#a155ed5ec938a9850383cdd2db34cbd32">writeULEB</a>(Prev.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/gsym/lineentry/#a7648b354c70ebeac2fa9001116b84d11">Line</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;Curr : Lines) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Curr.Addr &lt; BaseAddr)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a4d2fd926089a58d482fb67a362e11bad">createStringError</a>(std::errc::invalid&#95;argument,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><Highlight kind="normal">                               </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;LineEntry has address 0x%&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> PRIx64 </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot; which is &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><Highlight kind="normal">                               </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;less than the function start address 0x%&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Curr.Addr &lt; Prev.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/gsym/lineentry/#abf4509caa6884e20728dd5b8e08b925a">Addr</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a4d2fd926089a58d482fb67a362e11bad">createStringError</a>(std::errc::invalid&#95;argument,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><Highlight kind="normal">                               </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;LineEntry in LineTable not in ascending order&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uint64&#95;t AddrDelta = Curr.Addr - Prev.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/gsym/lineentry/#abf4509caa6884e20728dd5b8e08b925a">Addr</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><Highlight kind="normal">    int64&#95;t LineDelta = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Curr.Line &gt; Prev.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/gsym/lineentry/#a7648b354c70ebeac2fa9001116b84d11">Line</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><Highlight kind="normal">      LineDelta = Curr.Line - Prev.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/gsym/lineentry/#a7648b354c70ebeac2fa9001116b84d11">Line</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Prev.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/gsym/lineentry/#a7648b354c70ebeac2fa9001116b84d11">Line</a> &gt; Curr.Line)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><Highlight kind="normal">      LineDelta = -((int32&#95;t)(Prev.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/gsym/lineentry/#a7648b354c70ebeac2fa9001116b84d11">Line</a> - Curr.Line));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Set the file if it doesn&#39;t match the current one.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Curr.File != Prev.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/gsym/lineentry/#a193c4a1af11b83092b6db93d02219b1e">File</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint8&#95;t SpecialOp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="#ad9cd4a2e1984be7b783ac9bb124fa83b">encodeSpecial</a>(MinLineDelta, MaxLineDelta, LineDelta, AddrDelta,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><Highlight kind="normal">                      SpecialOp)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Advance the PC and line and push a row.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><Highlight kind="normal">      Out.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gsym/filewriter/#a45e4989cbade2289d6496aa80c97a748">writeU8</a>(SpecialOp);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// a single special opcode, we must do them separately.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Advance the line.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (LineDelta != 0) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><Highlight kind="normal">        Out.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gsym/filewriter/#a45e4989cbade2289d6496aa80c97a748">writeU8</a>(<a href="#a90de7cef943238ae1b541e31b373ed68ad70cf2d6845766439609f1cd17b9609c">AdvanceLine</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><Highlight kind="normal">        Out.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gsym/filewriter/#a3d4ccfc2f70d9b024d7489a9e943389e">writeSLEB</a>(LineDelta);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><Highlight kind="normal">      Out.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gsym/filewriter/#a45e4989cbade2289d6496aa80c97a748">writeU8</a>(<a href="#a90de7cef943238ae1b541e31b373ed68afdf828b840cddca16f427cc3f2b72fac">AdvancePC</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><Highlight kind="normal">    Prev = Curr;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><Highlight kind="normal">  Out.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gsym/filewriter/#a45e4989cbade2289d6496aa80c97a748">writeU8</a>(<a href="#a90de7cef943238ae1b541e31b373ed68afd55184035d28c16fb83e0a80ecd57a6">EndSequence</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error/#a4dfd0813c3d0e0a30439b5a3e9196b59">Error::success</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Parse all line table entries into the &quot;LineTable&quot; vector. We can</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// cache the results of this if needed, or we can call LineTable::lookup()</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// below.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gsym/linetable/#a45c433311387761ffb00f0aea6be6675"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/expected">llvm::Expected&lt;LineTable&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gsym/linetable/#a45c433311387761ffb00f0aea6be6675">LineTable::decode</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dataextractor">DataExtractor</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa20539e89704d20b98b97e9c3feac934">Data</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gsym/linetable">LineTable</a> LT;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">llvm::Error</a> Err = <a href="#a45e99fb329714d8911cb5e116eb8a3bc">parse</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa20539e89704d20b98b97e9c3feac934">Data</a>, BaseAddr, &#91;&amp;&#93;(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/gsym/lineentry">LineEntry</a> &amp;Row) -&gt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><Highlight kind="normal">    LT.Lines.push&#95;back(Row);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">; </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Keep parsing by returning true.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Err)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::move(Err);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LT;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Parse the line table on the fly and find the row we are looking for.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We will need to determine if we need to cache the line table by calling</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// LineTable::parseAllEntries(...) or just call this function each time.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// There is a CPU vs memory tradeoff we will need to determined.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gsym/linetable/#a9bca453dce01051bae3751cbb4d14fef"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/expected">Expected&lt;LineEntry&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gsym/linetable/#a9bca453dce01051bae3751cbb4d14fef">LineTable::lookup</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dataextractor">DataExtractor</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa20539e89704d20b98b97e9c3feac934">Data</a>, uint64&#95;t BaseAddr, uint64&#95;t Addr) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/gsym/lineentry">LineEntry</a> Result;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">llvm::Error</a> Err = <a href="#a45e99fb329714d8911cb5e116eb8a3bc">parse</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa20539e89704d20b98b97e9c3feac934">Data</a>, BaseAddr,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><Highlight kind="normal">                          &#91;Addr, &amp;Result&#93;(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/gsym/lineentry">LineEntry</a> &amp;Row) -&gt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Addr &lt; Row.Addr)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">; </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Stop parsing, result contains the line table row!</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><Highlight kind="normal">    Result = Row;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">; </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Keep parsing till we find the right row.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Err)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::move(Err);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Result.isValid())</Highlight></CodeLine>
